mapper.insert: insert into ${church}.auth_group (auth_set_idx, sort_no, auth_type_idx, value, reg_date) values (#{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort_no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auth_type_idx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ${church}.auth_group
auth_set_idx,
sort_no,
auth_type_idx,
value,
reg_date,
#{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sort_no,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{auth_type_idx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.delete: delete from ${church}.auth_group where auth_set_idx in (select auth_set_idx from ${church}.auth_set where year=#{nextYear} and k_part=#{kPartIdx})
